title: R Series Workshop
text: This is SMU Library Bite-sized R Series Workshop website.

title: R Series Session 7
text:
Why you are here?
Because you are:


tired of creating PowerPoint slides.
interested to create awesome web slides using R.

title: R Series Session 7
text:
Slide with Tabsets

The code chunkThe plot




pacman::p_load(tidyverse)
exam_data <- read.csv("data/Exam_data.csv")

ggplot(data = exam_data,
       aes(x = MATHS)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 10,
                 boundary = 100,
                 color = "black",
                 fill = "light blue") +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Maths scores")
